File List

Here is a list of all documented files with brief descriptions:
fuzzy.h [code]These functions allow a programmer to compute the fuzzy hashes (also called the context-triggered piecewise hashes) of a buffer of text , the contents of a file on the disk , and the contents of an open file handle . There is also a function to compute the similarity between any two fuzzy signatures
